roleset.name: take in completely, like food, breaking down/processing of food
roleset.note: DIGEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'digest' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from digest.01-v predicate notes)
DIGESTION-N NOTES: Corresponds with digest.01.Framed by anwen april 2011 (from digestion.01-n)

example.name: chew 100 times before swallowing
example.text: After *trace*-1 thoroughly digesting reams of information, he-1 often concludes that more data are needed, and when he finally decides to act, his movements sometimes seem excrutiatingly small.

example.name: passive
example.text: But once [the new securities]-1 are digested *trace*-1, they expect investors to focus on the weak economic data.

example.name: Both Args
example.text: Bob's digestion of dairy was impaired by his lack of lactase.
